docs.snippet: Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta is out for the season after having hip surgery, and Broncos center Dan Koppen will also miss the season after tearing the A.C.L. in his left knee....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta is out for the season after having hip surgery, and Broncos center Dan Koppen will also miss the season after tearing the A.C.L. in his left knee.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup: Baltimore Ravens tight end Dennis Pitta is out for the season after having hip surgery, major blow to team’s bid to repeat as Super Bowl champion; other football news noted.

headline.main: Ravens’ Pitta Out for Year; Broncos Lose Koppen, Their Center
headline.print_headline: Ravens’ Pitta Out for Year; Broncos Lose Their Center

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BEN SHPIGEL

docs.snippet: Rex Ryan lapsed into survival mode a day after G.M. John Idzik refused to acknowledge that Ryan would have the final say in the Jets’ quarterback competition....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rex Ryan lapsed into survival mode a day after G.M. John Idzik refused to acknowledge that Ryan would have the final say in the Jets’ quarterback competition.
docs.abstract: Ben Shpigel On Pro Football column; New York Jets coach Rex Ryan concedes that making starting quarterback decision will not be his alone, reversal of his past mind-set for team decisions.

headline.main: Jets’ Ryan, Used to Having Last Word, Becomes Voice in the Mix
headline.print_headline: Ryan, Used to Having Last Word, Becomes a Voice in the Mix

docs.snippet: While most of the Giants at training camp were busy looking ahead, linebacker Dan Connor and safety Will Hill were addressing their off-the-field issues....
docs.lead_paragraph: While most of the Giants at training camp were busy looking ahead, linebacker Dan Connor and safety Will Hill were addressing their off-the-field issues.
docs.abstract: New York Giants linebacker Dan Connor and safety Will Hill address their off-season issues at training camp, while most of their fellow players are busy looking ahead; Connor was arrested and charged for bringing a switchblade through airport security, and Hill received a four-game suspension from the league for his repeated marijuana infractions.

headline.main: Off-Season Problems Cloud Hopes for Giants’ Connor and Hill
headline.print_headline: Off-Season Problems Cloud Hopes For 2 Giants

docs.snippet: Ecuador international striker Christian Benitez died in Qatar on Monday of heart failure at the age of 27, the Ecuadorean Football Federation (FEF) said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ecuador international striker Christian Benitez died in Qatar on Monday of heart failure at the age of 27, the Ecuadorean Football Federation (FEF) said.

docs.snippet: Fluminense have sacked coach Abel Braga, the man who steered them to the Brazilian championship last year, after a run of five defeats dumped them in the relegation zone at the weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fluminense have sacked coach Abel Braga, the man who steered them to the Brazilian championship last year, after a run of five defeats dumped them in the relegation zone at the weekend.

headline.main: Brazilian Champions Fluminense Sack Coach Abel
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Champions Fluminense Sack Coach Abel

docs.snippet: Police divers on Monday searched a pond in Bristol, Connecticut, the hometown of former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez, for evidence linking him to the murder of semi-pro football player Odin Lloyd, a law enforcement source said on Mo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Police divers on Monday searched a pond in Bristol, Connecticut, the hometown of former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez, for evidence linking him to the murder of semi-pro football player Odin Lloyd, a law enforcement source said on Monday.

headline.main: Police Search Pond in Conn. Hometown of Ex-NFL Player in Murder Probe
headline.print_headline: Police Search Pond in Conn. Hometown of Ex-NFL Player in Murder Probe

docs.snippet: Mexico coach Jose Manuel de la Torre, under fire after a run of poor results, clung on to his job on Monday and was charged with seeing his misfiring team through to next year's World Cup finals in Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico coach Jose Manuel de la Torre, under fire after a run of poor results, clung on to his job on Monday and was charged with seeing his misfiring team through to next year's World Cup finals in Brazil.

headline.main: Under-Fire Mexico Coach De La Torre Keeps Job
headline.print_headline: Under-Fire Mexico Coach De La Torre Keeps Job

docs.snippet: Spain international goalkeeper Pepe Reina has left Liverpool for a season-long loan at Serie A club Napoli, but said in an open letter to fans of the five-times European champions it was not his decision to leave Anfield....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain international goalkeeper Pepe Reina has left Liverpool for a season-long loan at Serie A club Napoli, but said in an open letter to fans of the five-times European champions it was not his decision to leave Anfield.

headline.main: Reina Hurt at Liverpool Exit but Relishing Napoli Move
headline.print_headline: Reina Hurt at Liverpool Exit but Relishing Napoli Move
